page.title: 04Badlesmere : Clubs
page.content: Local Womens Institute (founded l93O)has 36 members with age range 35 - 75. Meetings are held monthly in the village hall with guest speaker and occasional outings to places of interest. Annual subscription is Â£5.A fund raising committee helps with upkeep of Badlesmere Lees, having purchased a tractor and mower with a rota of local people to cut the grass. A Floral Art Club has some 2O members meeting monthly for demonstrations and practice in flower arranging. Subscription Â£4.5O p.a. A playgroup for pre-school children meets in Badlesmere Hall 3 mornings per week (85 pence per session). Children learn to be creative with simple materials (egg boxes, crayons) and to inter-mix.
